text: Virus inactivation . Figure 1 shows representative fluorescent 40 × images of mammalian epithelial cells incubated with airborne viruses that had been exposed in aerosolized form to far - UVC doses ( 0 , 0 . 8 , 1 . 3 or 2 . 0 mJ / cm 2 ) generated by filtered 222 - nm excimer lamps .
